name: Last Knight (itch) (bytesalad)
description:
Protect the Merchant and they will provide you with upgrades to the hideout for a price. If they die, all is lost!

Progress from vulnerability to power!

Use the coins that you pick up throughout the landscape to buy upgrades from the merchant. Use the mouse to aim and shoot.

This game was entered into the SA Game Jam 2020.

Developers:

  • Matthew M Brown - Programming/Art/Animation
  • Phumulani L Zwane - Game Design/Level Design/Testing
  • Joshua Adam Pohl - Music
